livegrep

Fast, regular expression code search service
git clone https://source.static.kevinlin.info/external/livegrep.git
Log | Files | Refs | README | LICENSE
commit a770c3a4db380177075027fc80c61abe23eb6444
parent fc8df68b981dd4ec87cc083357d5aff84f1b6e1a
Author: Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>
Date:   Wed  6 Sep 2017 16:59:49 +0000

Increase variation in page titles

- Drop "code search" from the title of every page; retain it only as the
  title of the search page with no query
- Search results have title "$query - search"
- Browser has file or directory name as title
- Add a mediocre favicon to help identify livegrep tabs; this makes
  dropping "code search" less of a loss

@@ -395,6 +395,13 @@ var SearchState = Backbone.Model.extend({
     return base + (qs ? "?" + qs : "");
   },
 
+  title: function() {
+    var current = this.search_map[this.get('displaying')];
+    if (!current || !current.q)
+      return "code search";
+    return current.q + " ⋅ search";
+  },
+
   handle_error: function (search, error) {
     if (search === this.search_id) {
       this.set('displaying', search);
